game.name: Save The Octo
game.shortDescription: 옥토를 저장하면 물 한 봉지에 갇혀 문어를 저장해야하는 특이한 반응 게임이다. 물 누설을 방지하고 다양한 난이도를 통해 가서 포인트를 축적하기 위해 가방에 구멍을 커버.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Save the octo is an unusual reaction game for all fans of the genre. Plug the holes in the package with the octopus in time to save it from the leaking water and score as many points as possible.

reviewHighlights.text: In this game you have to save the octopus by plugging holes in the packaging. The point is simple: you have to press the necessary keys in sequence. I...
A casual and rather simple game in which you have to save an octopus in a sophisticated way, keeping it in a humid environment. Suitable for the small...
